casebody.data:
LIBERTY MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. GULF OIL CORPORATION, et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 83-3354. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Feb. 21, 1984. Christovich & Kearney, J. Walter Ward, Jr., Thomas C. Cowan, New Orleans, La., for plaintiff-appellant. Camp, Carmouche, Palmer, Barsh & Hunter, James R. Sutterfield, New Orleans, La., for defendants-appellees.

Before POLITZ, RANDALL and JOLLY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Having considered the record, briefs and oral argument, we affirm on the facts as found and the legal analysis made by the district court. 559 F.Supp. 777 (E.D.La. 1983).

AFFIRMED.
